name.description: Name of the extension that appears on the Extensions page.

description.message: Check GMail, Google Reader, Google Voice, and Google Wave.  Many sources, one number.
description.description: The description that appears on the Extensions page.

default_title.description: Initial tooltip for the browser action.

textdirection.description: For HTML documents, specifies the value of the HTML tag's style attribute, to set the text direction.

badge_error.description: Text displayed on the button badge when a service has an error.

badge_login.description: Text displayed on the button badge when a service is logged out.

badge_no_unread.description: Text displayed on the button badge everything is ok and read.

tooltip_service_separator.description: Separates the services in the tooltip of the toolbar button.

tooltip_service.description: Displays a service status in the tooltip.

tooltip_service_error.description: Displays a service status in the tooltip.

tooltip_service_login.description: Displays a service status in the tooltip.

no_unread.description: Caption for text when there are no unread messages.

open_unread.description: Caption for the Open Unread link.

popup_refreshing.description: Displayed next to the unread count while refreshing a service.

popup_error.description: Displayed next to the unread count while the service has an error.

popup_need_login.description: Displayed next to the unread count while the service seems to be logged out.

preview_timeout.description: Displayed instead of a service preview when a refresh times out.

preview_response.description: Displayed instead of a service preview when a service response cannot be parsed.

preview_login.message: Click here to log in.
preview_login.description: Displayed instead of a service preview when a service response indicates you are logged out.

addmore.description: Displayed as a hint in the popup to add more services.

options_title.description: Title and header on the options.html page

expand.description: Tooltip for expanders on options page.

collapse.description: Tooltip for expanders on options page.

basic_options.description: Header for section on options page.

oneclickopenunread.message: Open all services with unread items immediately when clicking the toolbar button instead of showing the popup.

openhiddenunread.message: Even open ones you've hidden from showing on the toolbar button.

protocol.message: Use HTTPS for all services instead of HTTP (recommmended).

openinnewwindow.message: Open in a new window instead of a new tab in the current one.

reusetabs.message: Reuse a tab that already has the service open.

bepickyaboutreuse.message: Only if the tab is viewing the service's inbox.

alwaysrefresh.message: Refresh a tab that is being reused like this.

server_queries.description: Header for section on options page.

toolbar_buttons.description: Header for section on options page.

no_unread_messages.message: When there are no unread messages:

showerror.message: Show error state on toolbar button.

errorcolor.message: Color of button when error occurs:

showloggedout.message: Show logged out state on toolbar button.

loggedoutcolor.message: Color of button when you need to log in:

showmulti.message: Show a unique color on the button when multiple services are unread:

maxactionicons.message: Maximum number of services to show on the toolbar button:

options_popup.description: Header for section on options page.

options_notifications.description: Header for section on options page.

options_audiofile.message: Sound to play when unread messages are found:
options_audiofile.description: Header for the audio file option.

options_services.description: Header for section on options page.

options_allservices.description: Header for options page list box.

options_enabledservices.description: Header for options page list box.

options_servicesettings.description: Header for options page property pane.

options_help.message: Drag and drop services from the left list to the right list to add them.  Drag and drop inside the right list to reorder.  Drag services out of the right list to remove them.  Finally, select items in the right list to change their settings.
options_help.description: Help message on options page for listbox usage.

options_displayname.message: Name to display for this service:

options_userefreshinterval.message: Use check interval below instead of global.

options_showonbadge.message: Include the unread count on the toolbar button and desktop notifications.

options_badgecolor.message: Toolbar button color when there are unread messages:

options_gmappsdomain.message: Google Apps domain to check (blank for Gmail):

options_gmaltcredentialshelp.message: Fill in a username and password to check that account instead of your logged-in one.  The logged-in account is still used when browsing or composing.  You don't need this if you only are checking your logged-in account, and if you are checking multiple accounts you should specify this for your logged-in account to avoid confusing Gmail.  WARNING: For security, keep the HTTPS option above checked when using this option to avoid broadcasting your account information to potential eavesdroppers.
options_gmaltcredentialshelp.description: Help text for alternate credentials option.

options_grfeedlist.message: Select the feeds/labels to check for unread items:

options_grloading.description: For the feed list, before it loads.

options_grall.description: For the feed list, caption for selection of all feeds/labels.

options_grfeeds.description: For the feed list, header for feed list.

options_grlabels.description: For the feed list, header for the label list.

options_grwarning.message: WARNING: Your selection includes the same feed multiple times, through a label selection.  Unread count may be inaccurate as such feeds will be counted multiple times.
options_grwarning.description: Footer for the feed list, if you have labels selected which include a feed multiple times.

options_gvshowall.message: Check for any unread messages, not just in the Inbox.

options_gwappsdomain.message: Google Apps domain to check (blank for Google Wave):

options_gwminnav.message: Minimize navigation pane when opened from popup.

options_gwmincontact.message: Minimize contacts pane when opened from popup.

options_gwminsearch.message: Minimize search pane when opened from popup.

ok.description: Caption for OK button on options page.

close.description: Caption for Close/Cancel button on options page.

cancel.description: Caption for Close/Cancel button on options page.

apply.description: Caption for Apply button on options page.

bad_number.message: You entered a non-number or an out-of-range number in field "$group$ - $before$N$after$".  This setting will not be changed.
bad_number.description: Message displayed when a bad number is entered in a numeric settings field.

options_audiofileerr.message: Could not read the audio file: $err$

options_audiofileerr_access.message: The OS or browser is blocking file access.

options_audiofileerr_noshare.message: Another application may be using the file.

options_audiofileerr_encoding.message: File is too big for encoding in a data uri.

options_audiofileerr_nofile.message: You did not select a file for field "$group$ - $header$".  This setting will not be changed.
options_audiofileerr_nofile.description: Message displayed when you forget to select a file in an audio file setting.

header.example: Sound to play when unread messages are found:

options_audiofileerr_notaudio.message: The file selected for field "$group$ - $header$" does not appear to be an audio file.  This setting will not be changed.
options_audiofileerr_notaudio.description: Message displayed when you select a non-audio file for an audio file setting.

header.example: Sound to play when unread messages are found:

leave_prompt.message: Your changes have not yet been applied with the "OK" or "Apply" buttons, are you sure you want to discard them?
leave_prompt.description: Shown when you make changes to options and try to close the page without saving.

changelog_title.description: Title and header on the changelog.html page

author_info.description: A section header on the Changelog page.

known_bugs.description: A section header on the Changelog page.

future_plans.description: A section header on the Changelog page.

legal_title.description: Title and header on the legal.html page.

disclaimer.description: A section header on the Legal Info page.

disclaimer1.message: This extension and its author are not affililated with any of the services this extension uses, nor their creators, including Google.  This program accesses public web services using public interfaces and APIs.  The authors of those services, including Google, cannot and are not expected to provide support for this extension.  Please see the extension author for support.

disclaimer2.message: Google, Gmail, Google Reader, Google Voice, Google Wave, and the logos of these services/entities are all copyrighted and trademarked by Google.  I make no claims of ownership over any of these trademarks or the services they represent.

disclaimer3.message: A number of existing Google Chrome Extensions were reverse engineered in order to learn how to work with the aforementioned public APIs.

disclaimer4.message: Various images with "modify and redistribute" licenses are packaged as a part of this extension (see below for attribution). If you are the owner of an image or piece of code that I have used and you do not wish for me to use it in this extension, please contact me so we can work something out.

apologies.description: A section header on the Legal Info page.

apologies1.message: Google, authors of the "Google Mail Checker" tool, which has far cooler animations, and which I peeked inside to figure out how to access the Gmail Inbox RSS feed.

apologies2.message: TPReal, author of TPGoogleReader, which has far cooler features.  Again, I used it on my quest to learn the Google Reader API.

apologies3.message: Jeremy Selier, author of Google Wave Checker, which uses a VERY hackish way of checking for unread waves that I had to use as well since there seems to be no API for it!  I like to think that mine is /slightly/ less hackish though.

apologies4.message: Thanks to Joris Van Hecke for translating One Number into French!

resources.description: A section header on the Legal Info page.

resourcesdesc.message: All resources listed here were modified for use in this extension.
